attributes.action: BRING BACK THE NIT NURSE TO OUR SCHOOLS!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I WOULD LIKE THE PRIME MINISTER TO BRING BACK A NIT NURSE TO OUR SCHOOL AND ALL SCHOOLS, IT ISN'T ENOUGH LEAVING IT TO PARENTS TO CHECK THEIR CHILDRENS HAIR, AS THEY ARE NOT ALL DEALING WITH THE PROBLEM! THIS WILL ONLY GET WORSE IF IGNORED!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
